title: Crane Design for Sword-Guard
description: two outlines of circular sword guard vertically arranged; top circle has upside-down image of waves at the top, and a flying crane\'s legs and tail feathers; lower image with white crane with wings spread, looking at viewer in profile at top; pine branches at bottom; crane\'s wings extend outside the circular outline; background of both images is a rusty orange-brown with brown and tan; when folded together, the two images form the top and bottom design for a sword guard; on very thin paper, mounted to paper backing
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
